title: Cheesesteak Cracker Appetizer Cathy McInnes
directions: In a saute pan heat oil.
Chop peppers and onions and add to pan, saute until tender.
On a microwave safe tray line the crackers in a row.
Cut the meat and cheese into quarters.
Place a quarter piece of meat, followed by a little sauteed veggies, and a quarter piece of cheese on top of the cracker.
Time to double fist this tasty cheesesteak cracker appetizer!
ingredients: 10 slices of eye round roast beef cold cuts
